playchallenge_ltt.br: Click to select a map and run a zoo. You may select specific game challenges, but you will have no primary goals.

playfreeform_ltt.br: Click to select a map and run a zoo. You can play with unlimited money, and all animals and objects are available.

playcampaign_ltt.br: Click to select a campaign to play. Each campaign has several scenarios, all with specific goals to complete.

gameoptions_ltt.br: Click to change video, sound, and other game options.

downloads_ltt.br: Click to check the Internet for game updates and new content. You can also enable or disable downloaded content.

loadsave_ltt.br: Click to play a previously saved game.

gameexit_ltt.br: Click to exit Zoo Tycoon 2 and return to Windows.

continue_button_ltt.br: Click to load the selected player profile.

delete_button_ltt.br: Click to delete the selected player profile.

add_button_ltt.br: Click to create a new player profile.

profile_manger_button_ltt.br: Click to add, delete, or select a player profile.

profile_manger_close_button_ltt.br: Click to close the Profile Manager.

font.name: arial
font.b: This program is protected by U.S. and international copyright laws.

font.name: arial
font.b: Developed by Blue Fang Games, LLC

tutorial_panel_play_ltt.br: Click here to play through the Zoo Tycoon 2 Tutorials.

tutorial_panel_dont_play_ltt.br: Click here to skip the Zoo Tycoon 2 Tutorials and just play the game.

color.text: Would you like to learn how to play Zoo Tycoon 2?

cancel_button_ltt.br: Click to make no changes and close the Save Game dialog box.

save_button_ltt.br: Click to save the game using the name you've entered.

delete_button_ltt.br: Click to delete the selected saved game.

cancel_button_ltt.br: Click to close the Load Game dialog box without loading a game.

load_button_ltt.br: Click to load the selected saved game.

delete_button_ltt.br: Click to delete the selected saved game.

font.name: arial
font.b: Press Spacebar to take a picture

help_button_ltt.br: Click to close this help screen.

color.b: Left click the "X button" to close this panel.
Press the "C" key to toggle the camera on and off.
Press the "SPACE BAR" to take a photo.

album_selecter_button_ltt.br: Click to select a new or existing photo album.

createnew_button_ltt.br: Click to create and name a new photo album

delete_album_button_ltt.br: Click to delete the selected photo album.

color.b: Delete All Photos From Album button

clearall_button_ltt.br: Click to delete all the photos in this photo album.

color.b: Delete all Photos From Camera button

delete_all_pics_button_ltt.br: Click to clear the film and delete all photos from the camera.

delete_pic_button_ltt.br: Click to delete the selected photos.

move_pic_button_ltt.br: Click to move the selected photo to the current photo album.

color.b: Export Photo Album to HTML button

save_html_button_ltt.br: Click to export the selected photo album to HTML.

prevpage_button_ltt.br: Click to display the previous page in the photo album.

nextpage_button_ltt.br: Click to display the next page in the photo album.

return_button_ltt.br: Click to close the photo album and return to the game.

return_to_album_ltt.br: Click to return to the photo album.

large_pic_ltt.br: Click to select a photo or double-click to enlarge the photo.

continue_button_ltt.br: Click to use the currently selected album.

vidoe_panel_tab_ltt.br: Click to change video and audio options, including video mode, quality, resolution and volume control.

full_screen_button_stt.br: Select to play Zoo Tycoon 2 in full-screen mode.

windowed_screen_button_ltt.br: Select to play Zoo Tycoon 2 in a window.

high_detail_button_ltt.br: Select to play Zoo Tycoon 2 with the highest video quality. This may cause slower game performance.

medium_detail_button_ltt.br: Select to play Zoo Tycoon 2 with medium video quality. This may improve game performance.

low_detail_button_ltt.br: Select to play Zoo Tycoon 2 with the lowest video quality. This may improve game performance.

custom_detail_button_ltt.br: Select to choose your own custom settings for performance.

rez1_button_ltt.br: Select to play Zoo Tycoon 2 in a resolution of 1280 by 1024 pixels.

rez2_button_ltt.br: Select to play Zoo Tycoon 2 in a resolution of 1024 by 768 pixels.

rez3_button_ltt.br: Select to play Zoo Tycoon 2 in a resolution of 800 by 600 pixels.

font.name: arial
font.br: Slide this bar to change the level of Shadow detail displayed in the game world.

font.name: arial
font.br: Slide this bar to change the level of detailed objects displayed in the terrain, including small tufts of grass and rocks that are appropriate to the terrain's biome type.

exit_dowload_button_ltt.br: Click to exit down load screen and return to the game.

apply_button_ltt.br: Click to apply all selected changes and exit now.

sound_panel_tab_ltt.br: Click to adjust the master volume and music volume levels.

master_audio_higher_button_ltt.br: Click to increase the master volume sound level, which includes animal and environment sound effects.

master_audio_lower_button_ltt.br: Click to decrease the master volume sound level, which includes animal and environment sound effects.

master_audio_thumb_button_ltt.br: Slide this bar left or right to change the master volume sound level, which includes animal and environment sound effects.

music_audio_higher_button_ltt.br: Click to increase the volume level of the music that plays when the menus are displayed.

music_audio_lower_button_ltt.br: Click to decrease the volume level of the menu music.

color.b: Change Menu Music Volume slider control

music_audio_thumb_button_ltt.br: Slide this bar left or right to change the menu music volume.

misc_panel_tab_ltt.br: Click to change first person mode and Message of the Day options.

misc_mouse_look_button_ltt.br: Select to have the ability to look around your zoo using the mouse while in 1st person mode.

color.b: Enable Message of the Day check box

misc_motd_button_ltt.br: Select to allow Zoo Tycoon 2 to connect to the Internet, download new messages, and display them on the main menu.

options.misc_motd_button_stt: Enable Message of the Day check box
options.enable_content_stt: Enable or Disable Content check box

color.b: Enable or Disable Content check box

enable_content_ltt.br: Select to allow or disable downloaded content in Zoo Tycoon 2.

show_content_ltt.br: Select to goto the directory inwhich the new content is stored.

overheadcameramode_ltt.br: Click to switch to the overview map where you can see all of your zoo.

buildingcameramode_ltt.br: Click to switch to an overhead view that allows you to build and place objects in your zoo.

firstpersoncameramode_ltt.br: Click to switch to a 1st person view, where you can walk around your zoo from a guest's perspective.

photocameramode_ltt.br: Click to switch to the Photo Safari view, where you can take photographs of the animals and objects in your zoo.

pgb_construction_ltt.br: Click to view the Construction panel, where you can buy fences, paths, buildings, benches, fountains, trash cans, and more.

construction_fence_tab_ltt.br: This tab shows the fences and gates you can buy.

construction_fenceplacement_octagon_mode.br: Click to start fence placement, and then drag the mouse to adjust the size of the octagonal fence. Click again to complete the fence.

construction_fenceplacement_rectangle_mo.br: Click to start fence placement, and then drag the mouse to adjust the size of the rectangular fence. Click again to complete the fence.

construction_fenceplacement_clickdrag_mo.br: Click to place one section of fence.
Click and then drag the mouse to construct multiple fence sections.

construction_fenceplacement_rubberband_m.br: Click to start fence placement. Subsequent clicks will place additional fence sections. Right-click to complete placing fence sections.

construction_path_tab_ltt.br: This tab shows the different types of paths you can buy.

pgb_animal_ltt.br: Click to view the Animals panel, where you can adopt animals or buy enrichment objects and animal food.

decline_button_ltt.br: Click to decline this animal for adoption.

female_button_ltt.br: Click to view the female animals you can adopt.

male_button_ltt.br: Click to view the male animals you can adopt.

animal_tab_ltt.br: This tab shows the animals you can adopt.

animal_enrichment_tab_ltt.br: This tab shows the toys and enrichment objects that you can buy for your animals.

animal_food_tab_ltt.br: This tab shows the food you can buy for your animals.

animal_shelter_tab_ltt.br: This tab shows the different types of shelters you can buy for your animals.

pgb_structures_ltt.br: Click to view the structures panel, where you can buy buildings and scenery objects.

structures_scenery_tab_ltt.br: This tab shows the scenery objects you can buy, including seating options, trash cans, decorative arches, fountains, and statues.

structures_building_tab_ltt.br: This tab shows the buildings you can buy, including food and beverage stands, restaurants, and restrooms.

pgb_terrain_ltt.br: Click to view the Landscaping panel, where you can place tree, plants, and rocks, and create hills, valleys, lakes.

terrain_tab_ltt.br: This tab shows the six terrain manipulation tools you can use to flatten or smooth surfaces and create cliffs, mountains, and plateaus.

hill_brush_button_ltt.br: Click to select the Create Hill brush. Then click or click and hold on the terrain to create hills.

valley_brush_button_ltt.br: Click to select the Create Valley brush. Then click or click and hold on the terrain to create valleys of varying depths.

flatten_brush_button_ltt.br: Click to select the Create Plateau brush. Then click or click and hold on the terrain to flatten raised terrain and create plateaus.

smooth_brush_button_ltt.br: Click to select the Smooth Terrain brush. Then click or click and hold on the terrain to smooth rough terrain or to create smooth hills.

cliff_brush_button_ltt.br: Click to select the Create Cliff brush. Then click or click and hold on the terrain to create cliffs.

ditch_brush_button_ltt.br: Click to select the Ditch Digger brush. Then click or click and hold on the terrain to create ditches.

terrain_biome_tab_ltt.br: On this tab, you can choose a biome type and then use the mouse to paint the terrain with plants, trees, and other elements that are appropriate for selected biome.

previousbiome_ltt.br: Click to change to the previous biome.

nextbiome_ltt.br: Click to change to the next biome.

brushincrease_ltt.br: Click to increase the size of the area the biome brush paints each time you click the mouse.

brushdecrease_ltt.br: Click o decrease the size of the area the biome brush paints each time you click the mouse.

terrain_tree_tab_ltt.br: This tab shows the different types of trees you can buy.

terrain_plant_tab_ltt.br: This tab shows different types of plants you can buy.

terrain_rock_tab_ltt.br: This tab shows the rocks you can buy.

pgb_staff_ltt.br: Click to view the Staff panel, where you can hire staff members, including zookeepers, maintenance workers, and educators.

staff_tab_ltt.br: On this tab, you can choose male or female staff members including zookeepers, maintenance workers, and educators.

keeper_tab_ltt.br: On this tab, you can choose a male or female zookeeper. A zookeeper can take care of all of the needs of the animals in your zoo.

mw_tab_ltt.br: On this tab, you can hire maintenance workers who will empty trash cans and clean up animal droppings in your zoo.

educator_tab_ltt.br: On this tab, you can hire educators, who can give informative talks to guests about animals, satisfying their thirst for knowledge.

zoom_in_button_ltt.br: Click to zoom in for a closer look at your zoo.

zoom_out_button_ltt.br: Click to zoom out for a higher-level look at your zoo.

rotate_counter_clockwise_button_ltt.br: Click to rotate your view of the zoo in a counter-clockwise direction.

rotate_clockwise_button_ltt.br: Click to rotate your view of the zoo in a clockwise direction.

multiinfo_button_ltt.br: Click to access information about your animals, guests, staff, and buildings.

undo_button_ltt.br: Click to undo your last action.

challenges_button_ltt.br: Click to display information about current challenges.

recycle_button_ltt.br: Click to change the mouse cursor to a bulldozer. Then, point to any object in the zoo and click to delete it.

scenario_goals_button_ltt.br: Click to display information about the current scenario goals.

options_button_ltt.br: Click to display the Game Options menu, where you can save games, load games, return to the main menu, or exit Zoo Tycoon 2.

zoo_finance_button_ltt.br: Click to display information about zoo finances, including income and expenses, graphs, awards, and donations.

photo_album_button_ltt.br: Click to view and organize photos taken in photo safari mode.

shell.rotate_clock_ltt:
Rotate Object Clockwise button
Click to rotate this object in a clockwise direction before placing it.
shell.rotate_counter-clock_ltt:
Rotate Object Counter-clockwise button
Click to rotate this object in a counter-clockwise direction before placing it.

maximize_ui_button_ltt.br: Click to expand the Game Controls panel to its maximize size, displaying the most information possible but obscuring some of your zoo.

minimize_ui_button_ltt.br: Click to reduce the Game Controls panel to its minimum size, obscuring your view of your zoo as little as possible.

color.b: Display Income and Expense Report button

zoo_money_button_ltt.br: Click to display the display your zoo's income and expense report.

color.text: Are you sure you want to

confirm.cancel_exit_zoo_button_ltt:
Return to Zoo Tycoon 2
Click to return to Zoo Tycoon 2.
confirm.exit_zoo_ltt:
Exit Zoo Tycoon 2 button
Click to exit Zoo Tycoon 2.

delete_pic_button_ltt.br: Click to delete the selected photo.

delete_pic_cancel_button_ltt.br: Click to cancel the deletion of the photo.

color.b: Delete All Photos from Camera button

delete_camera_pics_button_ltt.br: Click to delete all the photos from your camera.

delete_camera_pics_cancel_button_ltt.br: Click to cancel the deletion of all photos from your camera.

new_profile_cancel_button_ltt.br: Click to cancel and return to Profile Manager.

profile_create_button_ltt.br: Click to create a new player profile.

delete_profile_button_ltt.br: Click to delete the selected player profile.

delete_profile_cancel_button_ltt.br: Click to cancel and return to Profile Manager.

create_new_album_button_ltt.br: Click to create a new photo album, where you can view and organize the photos you've taken of your zoo.

color.b: Cancel Create New Photo Album button

create_new_album_cancel_button_ltt.br: Click to cancel and return to the photo album.

delete_album_button_ltt.br: Click to delete this photo album. This will delete all photos included in this photo album.

delete_album_cancel_button_ltt.br: Click to cancel and return to the photo album.

confirm.save_continue_button_stt: Save game and display Main Menu

save_continue_button_ltt.br: Click to save the current game and display the Main Menu.

no_save_continue_button_ltt.br: Click to continue without saving and return to the Main Menu.

return_button_ltt.br: Click to return to the current game.

sell_object_button_ltt.br: Click to sell the selected object. Any profit you earn is automatically added to your bank account.

no_sell_object_button_ltt.br: Click to cancel the sale of this object.

fire_staff_button_ltt.br: Click to fire the selected staff member.

no_fire_staff_button_ltt.br: Click to cancel firing the selected staff member.

delete_game_button_ltt.br: Click to delete this previously saved game.

delete_game_cancel_button_ltt.br: Click to cancel the deletion of this previously saved game.

color.text: Due to content changes, you must

exit_button_ltt.br: Click to close Zoopedia and return to the game.

next_topic_button_ltt.br: Click to view the next Zoopedia topic.

prev_topic_button_ltt.br: Click to view the previous Zoopedia topic.

toc_button_ltt.br: Click to view the Zoopedia Table of Contents.

export_map_button_ltt.br: Click to export a copy of this map to HTML.

exit_button_ltt.br: Click to close the zoo overview map and return to the game.

legend_item_ltt.br: Click to show or hide items on the zoo overview map.

info_tab_ltt.br: Click to view and adjust zoo admission price and to check your zoo's operational status.

info_price_up_button_ltt.br: Click to increase the admission price of the zoo. A higher admission price can lead to higher guest expectations.

info_price_down_button_ltt.br: Click to decrease the admission price for your zoo.

close_ltt.br: Click to close the Zoo Information panel.

marketing_tab_ltt.br: Click to view the Income & Expense report for your zoo.

graphs_tab_ltt.br: Click to view graphs that chart your zoo's progress in a variety of categories over time.

awards_tab_ltt.br: Click to view the awards your zoo has received.

building_list_tab_ltt.br: Click to view a list of the buildings in your zoo and their economic statistics.

donations_tab_ltt.br: Click to view a summary of donations your zoo has received.

donations_summary_filter_button_ltt.br: Click to view a summary of donations your zoo has received.

donations_species_filter_button_ltt.br: Click to view a summary of donations by species your zoo has received.

color.b: Click to view feedback from guests who have visited your zoo.

surveys_overall_survey_questions_filter_.br: Click to view the zoo's overall survey summary.

surveys_food_survey_questions_filter_but.br: Click to view the zoo's food survey

surveys_misc_survey_questions_filter_but.br: Click to view the zoo's miscellaneous survey.

zoostatus.graph_value_tab_ltt: Click to view of your zoo's value over time.

graph_profit_tab_ltt.br: Click to view a graph of your zoo's monthly profit over time.

graph_donations_tab_ltt.br: Click to view a graph of your zoo's monthly donations over time.

graph_attendance_tab_ltt.br: Click to view a graph of your zoo's monthly attendance over time.

zoostatus.graph_fame_tab_ltt: Click to view a graph of your zoo's fame and recognition level over time.
zoostatus.graph_members_tab_ltt: Click to view a graph that charts the number of zoo members your zoo has signed up over time.

graph_toggle_button_ltt.br: Click to change the graphs to display in bar graph format.

line_toggle_button_ltt.br: Click to change the graphs to display in line graph format.

open_zoo_ltt.br: Click to open the zoo for guests to enjoy.

close_zoo_ltt.br: Click to close the zoo. No guests will visit when the zoo is closed.

zoopedia_button_ltt.br: Click this button to access the zoopedia and get infomation about this entity.

research_button_ltt.br: Click this button to start researching this entity.

zookeeper_rec_button_ltt.br: Click this button to get zookeeper recommendations for this animal.

animal_status_info_ltt.br: Click to view the Animal Status panel.

animal_needs_info_ltt.br: Click to review the status of the animal's basic and advanced needs.

animal_general_info_ltt.br: Click to view the animal's gender, biome preference, and geographical location.

color.b: Put Animal up for Adoption button

adoption_button_ltt.br: Click to put this animal up for adoption so that other zoos may consider acquiring it.

release_button_ltt.br: Click to release this animal into the wild, an important step in conservation efforts.

pickup_animal_button_ltt.br: Click to pick up the selected animal wherever it is located in the zoo.

track_animal_button_ltt.br: Click to track the selected animal wherever it is located in the zoo.

crate_animal_button_ltt.br: Click to crate the selected animal wherever it is located in the zoo.

pickup_crate_button_ltt.br: Click to pick up the selected createa wherever it is located in the zoo.

uncrate_button_ltt.br: Click to uncrate the selected animal wherever it is located in the zoo.

guest_thoughts_tab_ltt.br: Click to view guests' thoughts as they visit your zoo.

guest_fav_tab_ltt.br: Click to view a list of the current guest's zoo favorites.

guest_general_tab_ltt.br: Click to view the current guest's activities and to review his or her basic needs.

pickup_button_ltt.br: Click to pick up the selected animal wherever it's located in your zoo.

track_guest_button_ltt.br: Click to track the selected guest wherever it is located in the zoo.

zoopedia_button_ltt.br: Click to view the Zoopedia topic that describes this object.

pickup_guest_button_ltt.br: Click to pick up the selected guest wherever he or she is located in your zoo.

pickup_building_button_ltt.br: Click to pick up the selected building or structure wherever it is located in your zoo.

sell_building_button_ltt.br: Click to sell the selected object. Any profit you make will be automatically added to your bank account.

sell_fence_button_ltt.br: Click to sell the selected object. Any profit you make will be automatically added to your bank account.

pickup_generic_button_ltt.br: Click to pick up the selected object wherever it is located in your zoo.

price_low_ltt.br: Click to set low prices on the items this building sells.

price_med_ltt.br: Click to set moderate prices on the items this building sells.

price_high_ltt.br: Click to set expensive prices on the items this building sells.

building_status_tab_ltt.br: Click to view the status of the current building.

building_finance_tab_ltt.br: Click to view the sales figures for this building.

building_color_tab_ltt.br: Click to change the color of the building trim.

staff_status_button_ltt.br: Click to find out what your staff member is doing right now.

staff_assign_button_ltt.br: Click to check on this staff member's current assignments.

staff_thoughts_button_ltt.br: Click to review this staff member's thoughts throughout the day.

staff_salary_button_ltt.br: Click to display this staff member's salary details.

pickup_staff_button_ltt.br: Click to pick up the selected staff member, wherever he or she is located in your zoo.

track_staff_button_ltt.br: Click to track the selected staff memeber wherever it is located in the zoo.

add_assignment_ltt.br: Click and then select an animal to assign it to this zookeeper.

remove_assignment_ltt.br: Click to remove the selected animal from this zookeeper's list of assignments.

educator_add_assignment_ltt.br: Click and then select a podium to assign it to this educator.

educator_remove_assignment_ltt.br: Click to remove the selected podium from this educator's list of assignments.

fire_staff_button_ltt.br: Click to fire this staff member.

open_queue_button_ltt.br: Click to open the message queue to view a list of messages about your zoo.

animal_info_tab_ltt.br: Click to view a list of all the animals in your zoo

animal_sort_type_ltt.br: Click to sort the list of animals by species type.

animal_sort_env_ltt.br: Click to sort the list of animals by enviornment suitability.

animal_sort_hunger_ltt.br: Click to sort the list of animals by hunger.

animal_sort_thirst_ltt.br: Click to sort the list of animals by thirst.

animal_sort_rest_ltt.br: Click to sort the list of animals by rest.

animal_sort_exercise_ltt.br: Click to sort the list of animals by exercise.

animal_sort_sick_ltt.br: Click to sort the list of animals by sickness.

animal_sort_happy_ltt.br: Click to sort the list of animals by happiness.

animal_sort_pregnant_ltt.br: Click to sort the list of animals by pregnancy.

guest_info_tab_ltt.br: Click to view a list of all the guests in your zoo

guest_sort_type_ltt.br: Click to sort the list of guests by guest type.

guest_sort_happy_ltt.br: Click to sort the list of guests by happiness.

guest_sort_fav_animal_ltt.br: Click to sort the list of guests by their favorite animals.

guest_sort_hunger_ltt.br: Click to sort the list of guests by hunger.

guest_sort_thirst_ltt.br: Click to sort the list of guests by thirst.

guest_sort_rest_ltt.br: Click to sort the list of guests by rest.

guest_sort_amusement_ltt.br: Click to sort the list of guests by amusement.

color.b: Sort By Guest Bathroom Need button

guest_sort_bathroom_ltt.br: Click to sort the list of guests by bathroom need.

guest_sort_thought_ltt.br: Click to sort the list of guests by thoughts.

staff_sort_type_ltt.br: Click to sort the list of staff by type.

staff_sort_task_ltt.br: Click to sort the list of staff by tasks.

staff_sort_assign_ltt.br: Click to sort the list of staff by assignments.

staff_info_tab_ltt.br: Click to view a list of all the staff in working in your zoo.

primary_goals_tab_ltt.br: This tab lists the primary goals for the current scenario.

primary_show_all_goals_button_ltt.br: Click to view a list of all the primary goals for the current scenario.

color.b: Show All Completed Primary Goals button

primary_show_all_completed_goals_button_.br: Click to view a list of all the primary goals you've completed for this scenario.

color.b: Show All Uncompleted Primary Goals tab

primary_show_all_uncompleted_goals_butto.br: Click to view a list of all the primary goals you have not yet completed for this scenario.

color.b: View Secondary Goals and Challenges button

secondary_goals_tab_ltt.br: Click to view a list of all the secondary goals and challenges for this scenario.

secondary_show_all_goals_button_ltt.br: Click to view a list of all the secondary goals for this scenario.

color.b: View All Completed Secondary Goals button

secondary_show_all_completed_goals_butto.br: Click to view a list of all the secondary goals you have already completed for this scenario.

color.b: View All Uncompleted Secondary Goals button

secondary_show_all_uncompleted_goals_but.br: Click to view a list of all the secondary goals for this scenario that you have not yet completed.

photo_goals_tab_ltt.br: Click to view a list of all the Photo Safari challenges, where you use a camera to meet your goals.

color.b: View all Photo Safari challenges button

photo_show_all_goals_button_ltt.br: Click to view the complete list of all Photo Safari challenges.

scenario.photo_show_all_completed_goals_button_st: View all completed Photo Safari challenges

color.b: View All Completed Photo Safari challenges

photo_show_all_completed_goals_button_lt.br: Click to view a list of all the Photo Safari challenges you've already completed.

scenario.photo_show_all_uncompleted_goals_button_: View all uncompleted Photo Safari challenges

color.b: View All Uncompleted Photo Safari challenges

photo_show_all_uncompleted_goals_button_.br: Click to view a list of all the uncompleted Photo Safari challenges.

staffmode.font: Right click to enable the cursor.

accept_button_ltt.br: Click to accept this game challenge.

decline_button_ltt.br: Click to decline this game challenge.

color.b: Do you wish to continue playing this scenario?

continue_button_ltt.br: Click to continue playing this scenario.

continue_next_button_ltt.br: Click to play the next scenario

no_continue_button_ltt.br: Click to exit to the main menu.

color.b: Do you wish to restart this scenario?

challenge_failed_ok_button_ltt.br: Click to continue playing this scenario.

minimize_filter_button_ltt.br: Click to button to minimize filter panel.

guest_toggle_button_ltt.br: Click to Show or hide guests in the zoo.

building_toggle_button_ltt.br: Click to Show or hide buldings in the zoo.

fence_toggle_button_ltt.br: Click to Show or hide fences in the zoo.

foliage_toggle_button_ltt.br: Click to Show or hide foliage in the zoo.
